Key Match Events: India bowled out Ireland for a paltry 96
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was the second match in a row in New York a team was bowled out for a total less than 100
Others: Former England captain Michael Vaughan upbraided the pitch at the Nassau County International Cricket Stadium here that is in use for the T20 World Cup match between India and Ireland, calling it a ‘sub-standard surface’
